subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Bad knees forced Notre Dame Coach Charlie Weis into the coaches box, a place he had not been since 2001. Weis called the plays from above the field at the Hawaii Bowl on Wednesday as the Fighting Irish defeated Hawaii, 49-21, to earn their first postseason victory since the Cotton Bowl after the 1993 season.
